text: Gerald McCann (11 November 1931 â€“ 26 June 2019) was a British fashion designer. He was seen as an important designer of the Swinging London fashion scene, alongside names such as Mary Quant. He moved to the US to work on New York's Seventh Avenue in 1974, returning to Britain some two decades later, where he continued supplying UK fashion retailers. McCann died in Lancaster on 26 June 2019 at the age of 87.The Times: Gerald McCann obituaryGerald McCANN Obituary ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:British designers
